description.value:
Requirements You're wielding an area or automatic weapon.

You prepare the perfect shot, able to tear through those closest to the impact point. If your next action is to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Area Fire], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Auto-Fire], or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Whirling Swipe], add two additional weapon damage dice to targets who are adjacent to the center point of impact or within the first 10 feet of a cone or line.
